strapiPost.title: Farmers Market Online
strapiPost.content:
After last year’s farmers market delay due to health precautions, the Downtown Bentonville Farmers Market App became an essential part of the market experience and is now a year round option for a modern experience. 

  • Online browsing: Shoppers and vendors can participate in an online Farmers Market, where all the fresh vegetables, local meats, and artisanal goods can be accessed on the smartphone app or website. 
  • Easy as 1, 2, 3: It’s a great way to support our local farmers and growers year round and to have easy, weekly access to locally grown and healthy food. Customers can checkout in a single transaction and pick up their order every Thursday without leaving their car.

For more information, click HERE.
